reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the Headquarters(2021 Unaudited)

description.narrative: ICRC headquarters in Geneva supports our delegations around the world. Geneva also manages the ICRC's role of advocate and defender of IHL, dealing with governments and with partners in the humanitarian community. Headquarters manages funding appeals, human resources and global communications.

participating-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

organisation.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Avenue de la paix, 1202 Geneva, Switzerland
